timeline.bodyText:
This is to fix this error (ref):
invalid source release 14 with --enable-preview
    (preview language features are only supported for release 15)

I think that's a restriction by the java-compiler that enable-preview has to be used with the latest release but could not find good documentation on this.
timeline.author: fawind

replies.bodyText:
Yep I stumbled across this restriction too when writing #1549

javac in JDK $N accepts the --enable-preview flag only in combination with --release $N or -source $N. (For brevity, only --release is mentioned in the rest of this JEP.)

https://openjdk.java.net/jeps/12
replies.author: iamdanfox
